channel.title: Changing background
channel.description: i cant change my background i looked everywhere for the image but cant find it where do i have to go to change the path to the background and the logging?

item.title: Changing background
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

The login box images are within the cache, you can use Tom’ s Cache Suite to replace those. As for the background image, look in Sprite.java for:

public Sprite(byte abyte0[], Component component) {

Under that you will see:

//Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage(location+"mopar.jpg"); Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage(abyte0);

Uncomment the first line and comment out the second line. Then you can just add your background picture to the client files and replace “mopar.jpg” with your pictures name.

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage(location+"mopar.jpg"); //Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage(abyte0);

Hope I helped ;D

Read full topic
